=== Game Rules ===
BasicGame key_handler=Pulse square_size=40
    SpriteSet
        floor > Immovable img=newset/floor2
        hole   > Immovable color=DARKBLUE img=oryx/cspell4
        avatar > MovingAvatar img=oryx/knight1
        box    > Passive img=newset/block1 shrinkfactor=0.8
        wall > Immovable img=oryx/wall3 autotiling=True
    LevelMapping
        0 > floor hole
        1 > floor box
        w > floor wall
        A > floor avatar
        . > floor
    InteractionSet
        avatar wall > stepBack
        box avatar  > bounceForward
        box wall box  > undoAll
        box hole    > killSprite scoreChange=1
    TerminationSet
        SpriteCounter stype=box    limit=0 win=True

You are controlling the avatar in a grid-based game.

=== Sprite Mapping ===
avatar -> 'a'
background -> '.'
floor hole -> '0'
floor box -> '1'
floor wall -> 'w'
stepBack -> 'avatar wall'
bounceForward -> 'box avatar'
undoAll -> 'box wall box'
killSprite -> 'box hole'
floor -> '@'
wall floor -> '#'
